text: Ezɨ gɨn Serksis aremezɨ, Atrivim Artaserksis an danganim inigha Persian atrivimɨn oto. Ezɨ Bislam ko Mitredat koma Tabel, koma gumazir me ko ingariba akɨnafarim osirigha Persian Atrivim Artaserksis bagha anemada. Me Aramɨn akamɨn akɨnafarim osiri. Eghtɨ gumazir a dɨponamim, Persian akamɨn a gɨgham.4:7 Akɨnafarir kamɨn mɨgɨrɨgɨam, ves 4:7 tugha ghua ves 6:18ɨn, me Hibrun akamɨn an osirizir pu. Puvatɨ. Me Aramɨn akamɨn an osiri.
